timeout.function:
writeTag('LocalVar.ChosenWellhead', 99) +

animation.text: if(__valve__.Feedback == 0, "The valve's feedback is disconnected.",'') + if(__valve__.Feedback == 2, 'The valve is open.','') + if(__valve__.Feedback == 1, 'The valve is closed.','') + if((__valve__.Feedback == 3)&&(__valveVars__.openCmd==1), 'The valve is in transition to open.','') + if((__valve__.Feedback == 3)&&(__valveVars__.closeCmd==1), 'The valve is in transition to close.','')
